l10n_text_rootcaexpl1.en: This is the Certificate we use for signing the CSRs we receive.

l10n_text_rootcaexpl2.en: To view the certificate in the browser, press

l10n_text_crlexpl1.en: The CRL (Certificate Revocation List) is a list of all revoked (invalid) certificates published by this CA.

l10n_text_crlexpl2.en: View the CRL in the brower:

l10n_cacert_fetch_error.en: Error getting the Root CA Certificate!

l10n_cachain_fetch_error.en: Error fetching the component and constructing the CA-chain!
